title: Dodging Solo Que
body: Do you really think that people dodge just to be %%%%s ? i dont think you should lose lp or have to wait for a game's when you get troll picks like soraka/blitz mid , i mean i left a few game only for that reason and i saved 4 other players the loss of their lp . I dont think that is fair that people can troll , and we cant report them because who wants to even play a game with someone who doesnt want to play properly ?

replies.body: The penalty isn't really there to stop trolls, it's there to stop people from dodging legitimate teams until they get a team they really like. That said I think you're right, a few free dodges or some kind of system to deal with trolls is needed. It's a pretty bad system where people are being punished for doing the responsible thing and avoiding trolls.

^ Then dont 1 trick, You have no right to complain if you have a champ pool of 1. 

I agree with the OP how ever, Sona JG, Yasuo support are all troll picks in my mind, I dont think we should lose the LP, Maybe 1 free dodge a day? Wouldnt be so bad

But Soraka/Blitz Mid can work if the player is experienced playing them that way.

But I agree. There should be some leniency. I'm a one-trick, but because (after the 2nd+ time) I lose 10 LP and have a 30 minute ban whenever I dodge when I don't get Evelynn Jungle, I'm stuck playing in a role and champion I neither like nor am good at. And hence I lose.
